nodes.text: GallisTech were a company that produced the 48 Roller wheel bike. The company decided the manufacturer the bike with jet engines, and the Roller became one of the most popular wheel bikes available, especially among speed-obsessed youths.

In the new Star Wars canon, GallisTech was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in The Cure, a Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game adventure written by James L. Cambias and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 6 in 1995.
